title: Yue Chen Yin - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles
author: Qing Fei   卿妃
description: She is the reincarnation of the Sea Dragon's daughter, born with extraordinary wisdom and talent. Yet because she was born in troubled times, suffered tragedy and became an orphan. After ten years of grinding, she finally cultivated an exceptional set of martial arts. With XiaoHun sword in hand, she begins a journey to seek revenge, even disguising as a man to enter court. At first, revenge was her everything. Until she met those two equally exceptional men…>
